text: The men's 4x400 metres relay event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 24 and 25 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Desmond Johnson Jerome Davis Robin Martin Obea Moore ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Hiroki Takahashi Dai Tamesue Masayuki Okusako Shinji Morita ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Kris Stewart Tom Lerwill Mark Rowlands Geoff Dearman ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 25 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
